entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Near blizzard developing early in the evening and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
